# 深度有趣 - 人工智能实战项目合集

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji
shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji
shendu-youqu-rengongzhineng-shizhan-xiangmu-heji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
